name: Aaron Allen
summary: Full Stack Developer with 9+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying scalable web and cloud-native applications. Skilled in Golang, Java/JVM, React, Angular, and Node.js, with additional experience in Python for AI/ML integration using FastAPI, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Experienced in building high-performance, secure, and testable systems, implementing unit, integration, and end-to-end testing, and optimizing application performance through caching, query tuning, asynchronous processing, and gRPC-based communication. Adept at CI/CD automation with GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps, Agile methodologies, and mentoring junior engineers, delivering enterprise-grade solutions in fast-paced environments.

experience.title: Sr. Software Engineer
